request.description: Includes details of the API request made to fetch the historical weather data.

type.description: The type of query, typically 'Weather' for weather requests.

query.description: The query string used to obtain the weather data.

language.description: The language used for response localization.

unit.description: The unit of measurement for the weather data, either 'm' for metric or 's' for imperial.

location.description: Provides information about the geographical location for which weather data is being fetched.

country.description: The country where the location is situated.

region.description: The region where the location is located.

lat.description: The latitude coordinate of the location.

lon.description: The longitude coordinate of the location.

timezone_id.description: The timezone ID of the location.

localtime.description: The local time at the location.

localtime_epoch.description: The local time at the location in Unix Epoch time.

utc_offset.description: The UTC offset of the location timezone.

current.description: Contains data about the current weather conditions at the specified location.

observation_time.description: The time of the last observation in the local time zone.

temperature.description: The temperature in degrees Celsius or Fahrenheit.

weather_icons.description: An array of URLs to weather icons.

wind_speed.description: The wind speed in kilometers per hour or miles per hour.

wind_degree.description: The direction that the wind is coming from in degrees.

wind_dir.description: The compass direction that the wind is coming from.

pressure.description: The atmospheric pressure in millibars or inches of mercury.

precip.description: The precipitation amount in millimeters or inches.

cloudcover.description: The percentage of sky covered by clouds.

feelslike.description: The temperature that it 'feels like' in degrees Celsius or Fahrenheit.

uv_index.description: The strength of the ultraviolet (UV) radiation from the sun.

visibility.description: The visibility distance in kilometers or miles.

historical.description: Historical weather data for a specific date range.
